law.catch_line: Scales to be certified and tested.
law.text: All scales used in stockyards or buying stations shall be certified. The scales shall be tested at least every six (6) months by a scale agency approved by the department. Certification of the scales shall be exhibited before issuance or renewal of any stockyard or buying station license.
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 28, sec. 6, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 225, sec. 6, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 130, sec. 8, effective June 17, 1954.
